```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(ggridges)
library(p8105.datasets)
data("weather_df")
```

Basic scatterplot
```{r}
ggplot(weather_df, aes(x = tmin, y = tmax))
```

Adding geom point

```{r}
ggplot(weather_df, aes(x = tmin, y = tmax)) + 
  geom_point()
```

Saving output

```{r}
ggp_weather = 
  weather_df |>
  ggplot(aes(x = tmin, y = tmax)) 

ggp_weather + geom_point()

```

Check that rows are missing

```{r}
weather_df %>% 
  filter(is.na(tmax))
```
